titleStmt.title: The duty and benefit of frequent Communion, in a sermon preached at St. Peter's Church in Lincoln, upon Passion Sunday, 1688 by Walter Leightonhouse ; published at the request of many that heard it preached.
titleStmt.author: Leightonhouse, Walter, 1656-1701.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
